entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Escoumins
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 11. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. Windy. High minus 4. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 4. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
